    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83820</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Une cellule de plante fanée</string>
            <string language="en">A wilted plant cell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine verwelkte Betriebszelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma pilha wilted da planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una cellula appassita della pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα βλαστημένο κύτταρο φυτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una célula marchitada de la planta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre une cellule de plante qui a perdu plus d'eau qu'elle n'en a absorbée. La cellule n'est pas  ferme et semble fanée puisque son contenu n'appuie pas contre  les murs.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a plant cell which has lost more water than it has taken in. The cell is not firm and appears wilted since its contents are not pressing against the walls.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mur de cellules</string>
            <string language="en">cell wall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cellules</string>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cellule de plante</string>
            <string language="en">plant cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">perte d'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water loss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se fanant</string>
            <string language="en">wilting</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine Betriebszelle welches 
mehr Wasser verloren hat, als es hat genommen innen. Die Zelle 
ist nicht fest und sieht verwelkt aus, da sein Inhalt sich nicht gegen
die Wände betätigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma pilha da planta qual 
perca mais água do que ele fêz exame dentro. A pilha não é 
firme e não parece wilted desde que seus índices não estão 
pressionando de encontro às paredes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una cellula della pianta 
quale ha perso più acqua che esso ha preso dentro. La cellula 
non è costante e non sembra appassita poiché il relativo soddisfare 
non sta premendo contro le pareti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει σε ένα κύτταρο φυτών 
όποιος έχει χάσει περισσότερο ύδωρ από έχει κερδίσει. Το
κύτταρο δεν είναι σταθερό και εμφανίζεται βλαστημένο δεδομένου 
ότι το περιεχόμενό του δεν είναι πατώντας ενάντια στους 
τοίχους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una célula de la planta 
cuál ha perdido más agua que él ha tomado adentro. La célula
no es firme y no aparece marchitada puesto que su contenido no está 
presionando contra las paredes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellwand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
